about_the_game:
Travel back in time and explore historically accurate ancient cities in this family-friendly action-adventure RPG. Meet real scientists who changed the world, battle monsters to protect the future, and solve puzzles while defeating bosses in this story-rich 2D adventure.

The Story


It’s 2050 and your first day at the astounding Aqli Academy for Gifted Children where you’ll meet your new brainiac buddies Khalid, Layla, Abdullah, and Aysha.

They need YOUR help investigating a mysterious machine that unexpectedly unleashes a crash course in history!

But watch out, there are dastardly, diabolical villains trying to change the course of time and the fate of history is at stake! The Time Hoppers will need to stop the machinations of the mad alchemist, Dr. Fasid, and his maniacal minions!

The Time Hoppers are prepared with technological tools and futuristic techniques to overcome whatever they encounter! Wander across wild desert wastes and whimsical cities in the wondrous ancient worlds waiting for you! Curiosity is richly rewarded with troves of treasure and nuggets of knowledge.

Time Travel to Save Scientists


Meet real scientists who changed the world and complete quests to protect their inventions.

Explore


You’ll be hopping back in time from the 7th to 15th century and adventuring across 7 lovingly recreated locales along the Silk Road!

Fight Monsters


Use your Nano Blaster to fight off armies of abnormal alchemical abominations.

Solve Puzzles


Use your mind to solve puzzles to progress through a rich story.

Features


  • Learn real ancient knowledge from real historical figures while bamboozling bad guys and abnormal alchemical abominations.
  • Packed full of peculiar puzzles, creative challenges, quirky quests, and minigames so you have non-stop new stuff to do!
  • Your skills and wits will be put to the test to uncover the treacherous tale of Dr. Fasid’s terrifying timeline!
  • Show off some of your special spoils in your customizable base back at the Academy!
  • Fully voice acted to bring the colorful collection of characters to life! Younger Hoppers can follow along easily too!
  • Comic-style cutscenes expand on exciting moments!
  • Adorable, hand-crafted aesthetic is optimized to run silky-smooth, even on low-end hardware.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.15
  • Processor: Intel i3 Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: Apple Silicon M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

name: Time Hoppers: The Silk Road

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: Time Hoppers: The Silk Road - $7.99 USD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 Processor or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 512MB RAM and WebGL enabled
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11

short_description: Travel back in time and explore historically accurate ancient cities in this action-adventure RPG for all ages! Save real scientists who changed the world by battling monsters and solving puzzles in this story-rich 2D adventure.
